text: No doubt stupidity would not be quite so rampant in America absent Twitter and social media but there is no way to avoid living with both. I can, however elect to abstain...

No, Chuck, I @dougkass will not be tweeting for a while... Twitter has both magnified and weaponized the frivolous. James Madison warned in Federalist No. 10 about the dangers of “faction,” our tendency to divide ourselves into parties inflamed by “mutual animosity” whereby we

are “much more disposed to vex and oppress each other than to cooperate for [our] common good.” @ScottWapnerCNBC @jimcramer @business @ferrotv @lisaabramowicz1 @carlquintanilla @cnbcfastmoney @threadreaderapp unroll
